pkgmetadata.longdescription: # dnx-dataThis is the DNX data solution package.## Setup#### Dependencies- Python 3#### Python Virtual Environment```bash# Create environmentpython3 -m venv env# To activate the environmentsource env/bin/activate# When you finish you can exit typingdeactivate```#### Install and test module```bash#### Install dependencies and modulepip3 install --editable .```## AuthorsModule managed by [DNX Solutions](https://github.com/DNXLabs).## LicenseApache 2 Licensed. See [LICENSE](https://github.com/DNXLabs/dnx-data/blob/master/LICENSE) for full details.
